verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall we <S%G3004>say<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> our <S%G4310>forefather<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> has <S%G2147>found<s%>?

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> was <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G2041>works,<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2745>something<s%> to <S%G2745>boast<s%> <S%G2745>about;<s%> but not <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G5101>what<s%> does the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>? "And <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to him as <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> to the one who <S%G2038>works,<s%> his <S%G3408>wage<s%> is not <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> as a <S%G5485>favor,<s%> but as <S%G3783>what<s%> is <S%G3783>due.<s%>

But to the one who does not <S%G2038>work,<s%> but <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Him who <S%G1344>justifies<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly,<s%> his <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> as <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%>

<S%G2509>just<s%> as <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>speaks<s%> of the <S%G3108>blessing<s%> upon the <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3049>reckons<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from works: <S%G2041><s%>
<S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> are those <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G458>lawless<s%> <S%G458>deeds<s%> have been <S%G863>forgiven,<s%> And <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> have been <S%G1943>covered.<s%>
<S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will not <S%G3049>take<s%> into <S%G3049>account.<s%>"

Is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3108>blessing<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> upon the <S%G4061>circumcised,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> upon the <S%G203>uncircumcised<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>? For we <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G4102>"Faith<s%> was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> as <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>"

<S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> was it <S%G3049>reckoned<s%>? While he was <S%G4061>circumcised,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcised<s%>? Not while <S%G4061>circumcised,<s%> but while <S%G203>uncircumcised;<s%>

and he <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> a <S%G4973>seal<s%> of the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which he had while <S%G203>uncircumcised,<s%> that he might be the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G203>without<s%> <S%G203>being<s%> <S%G203>circumcised,<s%> that <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> might be <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to them,

and the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who not <S%G3440>only<s%> are of the <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> but who <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>follow<s%> in the <S%G2487>steps<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> which he had while <S%G203>uncircumcised.<s%>

For the <S%G1860>promise<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to his <S%G4690>descendants<s%> that he would be <S%G2818>heir<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> was not <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> but <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> are <S%G2818>heirs,<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2758>made<s%> <S%G2758>void<s%> and the <S%G1860>promise<s%> is <S%G2673>nullified;<s%>

for the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G2716>brings<s%> <S%G2716>about<s%> <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> but <S%G3757>where<s%> there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> is there <S%G3847>violation.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> [it is] by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> that [it might be] in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with <S%G5485>grace,<s%> in <S%G1519>order<s%> that the <S%G1860>promise<s%> may be <S%G949>certain<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4690>descendants,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are of the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G3962>father<s%> of us <S%G3956>all,<s%>

(as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "A <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> have I <S%G5087>made<s%> you") in the <S%G2713>sight<s%> of Him <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G4100>believed,<s%> [even] <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2227>gives<s%> <S%G2227>life<s%> to the <S%G3498>dead<s%> and <S%G2564>calls<s%> into <S%G1510>being<s%> that which does not <S%G1510>exist.<s%>

In <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> he <S%G4100>believed,<s%> in <S%G1519>order<s%> that he might <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to that which had been <S%G3004>spoken,<s%> <S%G3779>"So<s%> shall your <S%G4690>descendants<s%> be."

And <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G770>becoming<s%> <S%G770>weak<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> he <S%G2657>contemplated<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> now as good as <S%G3498>dead<s%> since he was <S%G4225>about<s%> a <S%G1541>hundred<s%> <S%G1541>years<s%> <S%G1541>old,<s%> and the <S%G3500>deadness<s%> of Sarah's <S%G3388>womb;<s%>

<S%G1161>yet,<s%> with <S%G1519>respect<s%> to the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> he did not <S%G1252>waver<s%> in <S%G570>unbelief,<s%> but <S%G1743>grew<s%> <S%G1743>strong<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%>
and being <S%G4135>fully<s%> <S%G4135>assured<s%> that <S%G3739>what<s%> He had <S%G1861>promised,<s%> He was <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G2038>perform.<s%>
<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to him as <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> not for his <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> was it <S%G1125>written,<s%> that it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> to him,

but for our <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it <S%G3195>will<s%> be <S%G3049>reckoned,<s%> as <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him who <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> from the <S%G3499>dead,<s%>
[He] <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up <S%G1223>because<s%> of our <S%G3900>transgressions,<s%> and was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of our <S%G1347>justification.<s%>
